DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of intraocular pressure (IOP) lowering effect of one iStent versus two iStents in conjunction with cataract surgery in subjects with primary open-angle glaucoma, washed out of one anti-glaucoma medication prior to stent implantation.
DOC.brief_title: Open-angle Glaucoma Subjects on One Topical Hypotensive Medication Randomized to Treatment With One or Two Trabecular Micro-bypass Stents in Conjunction With Cataract Surgery
DOC.criteria: Phakic study eye requiring cataract removal and posterior chamber intraocular lens (PCIOL) implantation Primary openangle glaucoma (including pigmentary or pseudoexfoliative) Aphakic or pseudophakic with posterior or anterior chamber IOLs (PCIOLs or ACIOLs) (study eye) Prior stent implantations (study eye)
